blockedPhrasesConfigurationUpdate.systemMessageOverride: I can't help with credentials, secrets, or restricted topics. Please contact VaultMesh Security.

topicConfigurationsToCreateOrUpdate.name: competitor-pricing
topicConfigurationsToCreateOrUpdate.description: Blocks sharing non-public pricing, discounts, rates, or deal terms.
exampleChatMessages: What price did we quote Customer X?
What discount do we give Partner Y?

topicConfigurationsToCreateOrUpdate.name: unreleased-features-roadmap
topicConfigurationsToCreateOrUpdate.description: Prevents disclosure of unreleased product features or internal roadmaps.
exampleChatMessages: What are we launching in M18?

topicConfigurationsToCreateOrUpdate.name: partner-financials
topicConfigurationsToCreateOrUpdate.description: Prevents disclosure of partner financials or confidential MoU annexes.
